name: m.watch
description: **[m(icro)](https://github.com/ivoputzer/m.cro#readme)[watch](https://github.com/ivoputzer/m.watch)** is a lightweight [node.js](https://nodejs.org/) binary written in es6+ that watches cwd for changes and triggers command right after upon changes.
author: Ivo von Putzer Reibegg
